column4: does anyone know of a program that can allow me to save multiple file paths and copy them into another directory with the click of a button? thanks.
a panned file browser like midnight commander

i'd like to specify several file paths and to copy all these files into a directory.. and to be able to save this action so in the future, i can hit a "Backup now" button to copy all those specified files automatically
make a script that backups those files and call it from terminal or via a launcher
